img_above_text:
![Wukong Sandgate 76.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/5a/Wukong_Sandgate_76.jpg)
He also has a surprisingly quick lunge that’s very hard to dodge if you don’t look for the subtle cue of him slowly extending one arm backward before lunging forward with a quick sliding swipe attack. If you see it early, you can also Immobilize him to interrupt before he can perform it.
img_below_text:
If you try dodging around and attacking from the side, be aware that he can either use a quick tail swipe to stagger you, or swing his arm back quickly to draw you away from flanking him, so don’t get too comfortable.
Even as big as he is with a larger health pool, he’s not as ferocious as the enraged Second Prince. Do note however there is a **secret trick in this fight** : If you lure him into doing one of his larger slam attacks while your back is to the curved wall, his strikes may cause the wall to crack - revealing a secret!
summary_promot:

He also has a surprisingly quick lunge that’s very hard to dodge if you don’t look for the subtle cue of him slowly extending one arm backward before lunging forward with a quick sliding swipe attack. If you see it early, you can also Immobilize him to interrupt before he can perform it."
        - Following Text: "If you try dodging around and attacking from the side, be aware that he can either use a quick tail swipe to stagger you, or swing his arm back quickly to draw you away from flanking him, so don’t get too comfortable.
Even as big as he is with a larger health pool, he’s not as ferocious as the enraged Second Prince. Do note however there is a **secret trick in this fight** : If you lure him into doing one of his larger slam attacks while your back is to the curved wall, his strikes may cause the wall to crack - revealing a secret!"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a boss fight in *Black Myth: Wukong* against the "First Prince of Flowing Sands." The boss, a large, beast-like creature, is shown mid-attack, lunging forward with a powerful swipe, kicking up debris and sand. The preceding and following text highlights the boss's quick lunge attack, its subtle telegraphing cue, and strategies to counter it, including dodging, immobilizing, or exploiting environmental interactions like breaking a wall during the fight.
